title: what? :/
body: [](https://i.ibb.co/pQQ88GG/1.png) I don't know anymore and im probably the only one that think also im prabably is wrong :/. I didn't get mad about how much skins the popular champions have right now, but one thing i still got confuse is how hard can you guys keep fked up the skin drawings. I mean, it did improve after the old poppy and old sivir skin...etc. But how tf did you guys make an Teenage girl to an Middle-aged lady?????

replies.body:
I believe Kai'Sa is in her 20s, lore wise, not her teens.

But yeah, that's a tad... Off.
I don't understand. Not only does each illustration show an attractive young woman, the art styles aren't even close enough for me to make that kind of comparison. Can you explain in more detail?
Yeah... Riots art consistency is kinda... yeah...
